biotools.summary:
Ongoing integration of public SARS-CoV-2 data.

Browse Coronavirus RNA families, including 5' and 3' UTRs, as well as frameshifting stimulation element, s2m RNA, and packaging signal.

In response to the SARS-CoV-2 outbreak, Rfam produced a special release 14.2.

that includes new and updated Coronavirus families. Read more in a blog post or download the data.

The complete genome of severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) isolate Wuhan-Hu-1, cause of the disease COVID-19.

The Ensembl/GENCODE human protein-coding gene set linked to COVID-19 can be found at Human Covid-19 Gene Annotation.
